alert.note: Alert for Kemper; Lauderdale; Neshoba; Newton (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 22 at 6:55PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Newton, Kemper, southeastern Neshoba and northwestern Lauderdale Counties through 800 PM CST... At 655 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Herbert Springs, or 16 miles southeast of Philadelphia, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Damascus around 705 PM CST. Prismatic around 710 PM CST. Liberty around 715 PM CST. Blackwater around 720 PM CST. De Kalb around 730 PM CST. Porterville around 745 PM CST. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until midnight CST for east central Mississippi.
